short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds a clickable link to Social Blade for YouTube channels.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tube Blade is a Chrome extension designed to enhance your YouTube browsing experience by providing quick access to Social Blade analytics for any YouTube channel. The extension automatically detects YouTube channel pages and adds a glowing, clickable link to the channelâ€™s name. With a simple click, users can instantly access the detailed Social Blade statistics for the channel, including subscriber growth, video performance, and monthly analytics.

Usage:
On the YouTube Channel Page > Click on the red glowing YouTube Channel Name.
